scripts.test: run(){docker run --network='host' -v $PWD:/e2e -w /e2e cypress/included:4.0.2 --browser $1 --reporter junit --reporter-options mochaFile=junit-$1-result-[hash].xml --config screenshotsFolder=cypress/screenshots/$1,videosFolder=cypress/videos/$1,videoUploadOnPasses=false;} run;
scripts.test-full: npm run test chrome && npm run test firefox
